Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  shr.test

// Need counterexample(s) where cardinality is on the value field itself (not allowed in Grammar 6), for example Value: 1..* string or Value: string 1..* or a constraint on an inherited value:  Value 0..0

Entry: CardConstraintOnValueChild
Description:  "It is an entry with a card constraint on the value's child"
Value:        Thing1
              Thing1.Thing2 1..2

Element:        Thing1
Property:       Thing2 0..*

Element:        Thing2
Value:          string
